Uses of Interface
GinRummyPlayer

  • Uses of GinRummyPlayer in <Unnamed>

    Classes in <Unnamed> that implement GinRummyPlayer 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  SimpleGinRummyPlayer
    Implements a random dummy Gin Rummy player that has the following trivial, poor play policy: Ignore opponent actions and cards no longer in play.
    Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type GinRummyPlayer 
    Constructor Description
    GinRummyGame​(GinRummyPlayer player0, GinRummyPlayer player1)
    Create a GinRummyGame with two given players
